lines: I WILL SING OF JESUSÕ LOVE
Njakwiimba a luyando, Luyando ilwa Jesu,
Wakasiya ma julu, Akufwa a kalivali.
Njakwiimba luyando lwakwe, A moyo uka mwiimbile,
Nketa jisi misozi, Jesu wa ndililila,
Bupati bwa luyando, Nyika tiikwe kuzyiba,
Zibi zya ngu zya vula, Zila kutubisigwa.
Kunyina ncenda cita, Nakuba wandi yanda,
